name: Blue-Strawberry Milk
description:
You've all heard of blue raspberry. Now meet 'blue' strawberry :)

#EJUICEMAKERS
  

A delicate, creamy blueberry-strawberry milk that POPS(!!) at day 14.
No substitutions are recommended. Not recommended at anything less than a 14-day steep.
  
  
You may not use this recipe for commercial profit. It is also the creator's wish that you do not copy this to any other websites.
author: SixStrings952

reviews.text: Great recipe even as early as 3 days but really Pops after the recommended 14 days. Mix this up for a Great BLUE strawberry, Do IT!!
This is quite tasty after a good shake. Weâ€™ll see if I can make it last till the end of a steep!
